This website provides information about the cluster of the Centre de Recherche en Neurosciences de Lyon (CRNL).

## SSH

Check the tutorial for [easy SSH access](./help_ssh) with SSH keys, to avoid having to enter passwords in the future.

## Job submission

Check the two part tutorial for efficient and responsible job submission on the cluster using Slurm and Python (including interactive Notebooks).

[Part 1](./Tutorial_Cluster_Part1)
[Part 2](./Tutorial_Cluster_Part2)


## How to contribute

To contribute to the development and conception of these guidelines, request access to the CRNL Github organization to [Samuel Garcia](samuel.garcia@cnrs.fr) or [Romain Ligneul](romain.ligneul@inserm.fr).
